net.sf.kdgcommons.codec

Class Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.kdgcommons.codec.Codec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Base64Codec, HexCodec

    public abstract class Codec
extends Object
    Implementations translate an input stream to an output stream according to specific rules. As a convenience, instances also provide a conversion between byte arrays, and may provide conversions to/from strings.

    Callers should not make any assumptions about stream buffering, and must close the streams (if appropriate) after encoding/decoding.

    Any method may throw CodecException.

    Instances are thread-safe and reentrant.

    Since:
    1.0.14

      • decode

        public byte[] decode(byte[] src,
                     int off,
                     int len)
        Convenience method that decodes a section of the passed array. The caller is responsible for ensuring that the specified section is actually valid encoded data.

      • skipIfSeparator

        protected static void skipIfSeparator(InputStream in,
                                      byte[] separator)
                               throws IOException
        Checks the content of the stream against the separator, and skips the separator if they match. Note: requires a wrapped stream.
        Throws:
        IOException
